text: nabee to momineen se khud unakee jaanon se bhee badhakar haq rakhate hain (kyonki vah goya ummat ke meharabaan baap hain) aur unakee beeviyaan (goya) unakee maen hain aur momineen va muhaajireen mein se (jo log baaham) qaraabatadaar hain. kitaaben khuda kee rooh se (gairon kee nisbat) ek doosare ke (tarke ke) jyaada haqadaar hain magar (jab) tum apane doston ke saath sulook karana chaaho (to doosaree baat hai) ye to kitaabe (khuda) mein likha hua (maujood) hai
